content.html: A big mistake a lot of students make in my opinion is going to uni and getting grades, and that's it. If you're here on Twitter, blogging, contributing to open source projects, and networking, you're already one step ahead in finding success.
content.value:
A big mistake a lot of students make in my opinion is going to uni and getting grades, and that's it.

If you're here on Twitter, blogging, contributing to open source projects, and networking, you're already one step ahead in finding success.
